sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-order', templateUrl: './order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order.component.css'] }) export class OrderComponent { couponName: string; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { this.couponName = params.name; }); } }
